itunes:title: Q&A: your most asked gym girl questions w/ britt
title: Q&A: your most asked gym girl questions w/ britt
itunes:author: Brittany Lupton
description:
it's a week for mobility, mentally handling missing the gym, pursuing fitness without it consuming your life, how to become a CPT, balancing motherhood or a busy 9-5 schedule, fixing muscle imbalances & so much more as britt answers some of your most asked gym girl questions!

Train with Britt

Shop Gymshark

4:16 review of the week

5:28 Why is mobility important & how do I start?

16:45 How to mentally handle a day where the gym doesn’t happen

18:55 How to pursue a fitness goal without it consuming your life

25:40 How to become a Certified Personal Trainer

28:33 How to not stress about your fitness journey when life is changing

33:14 How to balance mom life or a 9-5 job

37:14 How to fix muscle imbalances
